00147    template <class Interaction>
00148    ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::ExternalPotentialImpl(System& system)
00149     : ExternalPotential(),
00150       SubSystem(system),
00151       interactionPtr_(0),
00152       isCopy_(false)
00153    {  interactionPtr_ = new Interaction(); }
00154  
00155    /* 
00156    * Constructor, copy from ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>.
00157    */
00158    template <class Interaction>
00159    ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::ExternalPotentialImpl(
00160                          ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>& other)
00161     : ExternalPotential(),
00162       SubSystem(other.system()),
00163       interactionPtr_(&other.interaction()),
00164       isCopy_(true)
00165    {}

00174    /* 
00175    * Read parameters from file.
00176    */
00177    template <class Interaction>
00178    void ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00179    {
00180       // Read only if not a copy.  Do not indent interaction block.
00181       if (!isCopy_) {
00182          readBegin(in, "ExternalPotential");
00183          interaction().setNAtomType(simulation().nAtomType());
00184          interaction().setBoundary(system().boundary());
00185          bool nextIndent = false;
00186          readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00187          readEnd(in);
00188       }
00189    }

00205    /*
00206    * Return external energy of an atom.
00207    */
00208    template <class Interaction>
00209    double 
00210    ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energy(const Vector& position, int typeId) 
00211       const
00212    { return interaction().energy(position, typeId); }
00213 
00214    /*
00215    * Return external force on an atom.
00216    */
00217    template <class Interaction>
00218    void ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::getForce(const Vector& position, 
00219                                                int typeId, Vector& force) const
00220    { interaction().getForce(position, typeId, force); }
00221 
00222    /* 
00223    * Return total external potential energy.
00224    */
00225    template <class Interaction>
00226    double ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energy() const
00227    {
00228       System::ConstMoleculeIterator molIter;
00229       Molecule::ConstAtomIterator atomIter;
00230       double energy = 0.0;
00231       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00232          for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00233             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00234                energy += interaction().energy(atomIter->position(),
00235                                                     atomIter->typeId());
00236             }
00237          }
00238       }
00239       return energy;
00240    }
00241 
00242    /* 
00243    * Add external forces to total.
00244    */
00245    template <class Interaction>
00246    void ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces()
00247    {
00248       Vector  force; 
00249       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00250       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00251       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00252          for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00253             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00254                interaction().getForce(atomIter->position(), 
00255                                             atomIter->typeId(), force);
00256                atomIter->force() += force;
00257             }
00258          }
00259       }
00260    }
00261 
00262    template <class Interaction>
00263    double ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::atomEnergy(const Atom &atom) const
00264    {
00265       double  energy;
00266 
00267       energy = 0.0;
00268       energy += interaction().energy(atom.position(), atom.typeId());
00269       return energy;
00270    }
00271 
00272    template <class Interaction>
00273    inline Interaction& ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::interaction()
00274    { return *interactionPtr_; }
00275 
00276    template <class Interaction>
00277    inline const Interaction& ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::interaction() const
00278    { return *interactionPtr_; }

00280    /*
00281    * Return external interaction class name.
00282    */
00283    template <class Interaction>
00284    std::string ExternalPotentialImpl<Interaction>::interactionClassName() const
00285    {  return interaction().className(); }
